description: With an automatic import from the database of IMDB, export to csv, text or HTML, thumbnail cover preview, a loan tracker, advances search and filter functions and multi-language user interface. EMDB doesn't need a .NET framework or any other external libraries and is therefore fully portable. And best of all... it's free!
summary: EMDB is an application to keep track of your movie and TV Series collection. Both physical discs and media files are fully supported.
author: Wicked & Wild Inc.
